data.title: Lists of licensed companies
data.meta_description: Lists of all companies currently holding a gas or electricity licence to operate in Great Britain.
data.text:
The list below contains individual companies and associated publications. This includes direct company correspondence and items such as licence applications, derogations and penalty notices.

You can filter the companies by license type.

View current lists of electricity and gas licensees here:

List of all electricity licensees including suppliers
